verses.verse: <S%H310>After<s%> these <S%H1697>things<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> unto <S%H87>Abram<s%> in a <S%H4236>vision<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> <S%H87>not<s%>, Abram: I am your <S%H4043>shield<s%>, and your <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H7235>great<s%> <S%H7939>reward<s%>.

And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>, what will you <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H1980>me<s%>, seeing I go <S%H6185>childless<s%>, and the <S%H1121>steward<s%> of my <S%H1004>house<s%> is <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H461>Eliezer<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>?
And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5414>Behold<s%>, to me you have given <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%>: <S%H1121>and<s%>, see, one born in my <S%H1004>house<s%> is my <S%H3423>heir<s%>.

<S%H1697>And<s%>, behold, the word of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto <S%H559>him<s%>, saying, This shall not be your <S%H3423>heir<s%>; but he that shall come <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of your own <S%H4578>bowels<s%> shall be your <S%H3423>heir<s%>.

And he brought him <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H2351>abroad<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5027>Look<s%> now toward <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H5608>count<s%> the <S%H3556>stars<s%>, if you are <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5608>number<s%> <S%H559>them<s%>: and he said unto <S%H3541>him<s%>, So shall your seed <S%H2233>be<s%>.
And he <S%H539>believed<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; and he <S%H2803>counted<s%> it to him for <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3068>him<s%>, I am the Lord that brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H218>Ur<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldees<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> you this <S%H776>land<s%> to inherit <S%H3423>it<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>, <S%H4100>how<s%> shall I <S%H3045>know<s%> that I shall inherit <S%H3423>it<s%>?

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3947>him<s%>, Take me a <S%H5697>heifer<s%> of three years <S%H8027>old<s%>, and a she <S%H5795>goat<s%> of three years <S%H8027>old<s%>, and a <S%H352>ram<s%> of three years <S%H8027>old<s%>, and a <S%H8449>turtledove<s%>, and a young <S%H1469>pigeon<s%>.

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> unto him all <S%H1334>these<s%>, and divided them in the <S%H8432>midst<s%>, and <S%H5414>laid<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H1335>piece<s%> one <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H7453>another<s%>: but the <S%H6833>birds<s%> divided he <S%H1334>not<s%>.
And when the <S%H5861>birds<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> upon the <S%H6297>carcasses<s%>, <S%H87>Abram<s%> drove them <S%H5380>away<s%>.

And when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> was going <S%H935>down<s%>, a deep <S%H8639>sleep<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon <S%H87>Abram<s%>; <S%H367>and<s%>, a horror of <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2825>darkness<s%> fell upon <S%H5307>him<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H87>Abram<s%>, <S%H3045>Know<s%> for <S%H3045>sure<s%> that your <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall be a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> in a <S%H776>land<s%> that is not <S%H5647>theirs<s%>, and shall serve <S%H6031>them<s%>; and they shall afflict them <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>;

And also that <S%H1471>nation<s%>, whom they shall <S%H5647>serve<s%>, will I <S%H1777>judge<s%>: and <S%H310>afterward<s%> shall they come <S%H3318>out<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7399>substance<s%>.
And you shall <S%H935>go<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%>; you shall be <S%H6912>buried<s%> in a <S%H2896>good<s%> old <S%H7872>age<s%>.

But in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> they shall come <S%H2008>here<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>: for the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> is not <S%H2008>yet<s%> <S%H8003>full<s%>.

And it came to <S%H8121>pass<s%>, that, when the sun went <S%H935>down<s%>, and it was <S%H5939>dark<s%>, behold a <S%H6227>smoking<s%> <S%H8574>furnace<s%>, and a <S%H784>burning<s%> <S%H3940>lamp<s%> that <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> those <S%H1506>pieces<s%>.

In the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H87>Abram<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Unto your <S%H2233>seed<s%> have I <S%H5414>given<s%> this <S%H776>land<s%>, from the <S%H5104>river<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> unto the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5104>river<s%>, the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>:
The <S%H7017>Kenites<s%>, and the <S%H7074>Kenizzites<s%>, and the <S%H6935>Kadmonites<s%>,
And the <S%H2850>Hittites<s%>, and the <S%H6522>Perizzites<s%>, and the <S%H7497>Rephaims<s%>,
And the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, and the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, and the <S%H1622>Girgashites<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%>.
